definition: Yamaguchi (Japanese surname and place name)/Yamaguchi prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Nathu La (Himalayan pass on Silk Road between Tibet and Indian Sikkim)
Yamaguchi prefecture in southwest of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]

sentences.english: The mochi-making assembly is an annual tradition of the Yamaguchi-gumi.
sentences.chinese: 捣麻糬大会是山口组每年的惯例。

sentences.english: The crater in residual volcanic activity that the volcanic cone within.
sentences.chinese: 此火山口里有个显示残馀火山活动的内火山锥。

sentences.english: Yamaguchi died Monday at the age of 93.
sentences.chinese: 本周一山口疆辞别了人世，享年93岁。

sentences.english: An ash cone rises from the center of the crater, casting a dark triangular shadow.
sentences.chinese: 火山口中间是火山灰锥，投下了三角形的暗影。

sentences.english: It was actually snowing very hard a few miles uphill toward Cottonwood Pass.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，下雪时即使几英里也很难登上卡顿山口。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the characteristics of the Qibao-Shan caldera in early Cretaceous.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了七宝山早白垩世破火山口的特征。

sentences.english: Details of Yamaguchi's health problems were not released.
sentences.chinese: 有关山口勉的健康问题并没有被公布。

sentences.english: So, it looks like a mountain  pass, right?
sentences.chinese: 它看起来就像是山口，对吧？

sentences.english: Pass for the second Eurasian continental bridge an important railway crossings.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉山口为第二座亚欧大陆桥的重要铁路口岸。

sentences.english: Lava boiled up from the crater of the volcano.
There are 111 species of benthic macrofauna in Shankou mangrove reserve area, Guangxi, China.
sentences.chinese: 山口红树林区有111种大型底栖动物。

sentences.english: But it isn't just filled-in craters.
sentences.chinese: 但并非仅为火山口占据。

sentences.english: The underground mills of Col-des-Roches are unusual.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏山口的地下磨坊是很不寻常的景观。

sentences.english: Crater Lake is not connected to any rivers or streams.
sentences.chinese: 火山口湖不与任何江河相连接。

sentences.english: A miner's hut just inside the crater of Kawah Ijen.
sentences.chinese: 一个矿工的小屋只是卡瓦Ijen内的火山口。

sentences.english: For the Americans studied Kasserine Pass even more intently than the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 美国人对凯瑟琳山口惨败的研究要比德国人认真的多。
